library(shiny)  #first we load the package

  ui <- fluidPage() # define the user interface
  # determines the layout and appearance of the app
  # going to use a fluidPage, others are available but will use this for now
  
  server <- function(input, output){
    #define the server, this defines the logic of our app
  }
  
  shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server) #run function with ui and server as input
